function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation and air circulation in limited-sized domestic spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and poor air quality","Mitigation":"Use of ventilation systems and air purifiers, and regular opening of windows and doors","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Residents of limited-sized domestic spaces","Owner":"Health authorities, building owners, residents"},{"Description":"High cost of implementing vertical gardens in housing levels","Impact":"Limited access to green spaces and nature, which can impact mental and physical well-being","Mitigation":"Utilize affordable materials, DIY projects, and community gardening initiatives","Technologies":"Vertical garden kits, sustainable building materials","People":"Residents of all housing levels","Owner":"Community organizations, local governments, residents"},{"Description":"Climatic impact on balcony design","Impact":"Reduced comfort and usability of balconies for residents","Mitigation":"Consideration of local climatic conditions, use of shading and weather-resistant materials","Technologies":"Weather forecasting tools, shading systems, weather-resistant materials","People":"Residents with balconies","Owner":"Building owners, architects, residents"}]}
